name: enigmatic-card
effect: Unlocks Looker's motel room on Route 8.
short_effect: Unlocks Looker's motel room on Route 8.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A mysterious card.
Written on it is a request for you to go to a
guest room in an Akala motel on Route 8.
